# Special Characters & Edge Cases

Testing various special characters and Unicode support.

## Unicode Examples

- Japanese: "Hello, World!"
- Russian: "Hello, World!"
- Emoji: "Hello, World!"
- Arabic: "Hello, World!" (RTL text)

## Code with Special Operators

```rust
// Rust operators
let a = 5 << 2;  // Bit shift
let b = a & 0xFF;  // Bitwise AND
let c = a | 0x0F;  // Bitwise OR
let d = !c;  // Bitwise NOT
```

## HTML Entities

- Less than: &lt;
- Greater than: &gt;
- Ampersand: &amp;
- Quote: &quot;

## Escape Sequences

```
\n - newline
\t - tab
\r - carriage return
\\ - backslash
\" - quote
```

## Mathematical Symbols

- Pi: "~3.14159"
- Infinity: "inf"
- Summation: "sum"
- Square root: "sqrt"

## Path Examples

- Unix: /usr/local/bin/qfs
- Windows: C:\Program Files\QFS\qfs.exe
- URL: https://example.com/search?q=rust+programming

## Markdown Special Chars

*italic* **bold** `code` ~~strikethrough~~

> Blockquote with special chars: <>&
